TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ContentPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ContentPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指出類型的哪一個屬性是 XAML 內容屬性。

span.span: Indicates which property of a type is the XAML content property.

summary.span: XAML 處理器會在處理屬性化類型之 XAML 表示的 XAML 子項目時，使用這項資訊。

span.span: A XAML processor uses this information when processing XAML child elements of XAML representations of the attributed type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果相關聯的屬性型別的`string`或`object`，XAML 處理器會嘗試識別的值轉換技術。If the associated property of a is not of type `string` or `object`, a XAML processor attempts to identify a value conversion technique. 第一次檢查適合的 XAML 語言基本類型或特定的原生轉換，啟用該特定的 XAML 寫入器實作的原生型別轉換。The first check is for native type conversion, either of the XAML language primitives or of specific native conversions enabled by that particular XAML writer implementation. 下一個步驟是尋找型別轉換子。The next step is to look for a type converter. 在.NET 實作中，類型轉換器會識別根據任一成員層級或型別層級定義上套用。In the .NET implementations, a type converter is identified based on on either the member level or type level definition that applies. 如果可以識別沒有值的轉換，在 XAML 物件寫入器通常就會擲回例外狀況。If no value conversion can be identified, a XAML object writer typically throws an exception. 為了接受多個單一物件項目，做為內容，XAML 內容屬性的型別必須是可支援做為集合類型。In order to accept more than a single object element as content, the type of the XAML content property must be supportable as a collection type. 由於`Inherited=true`屬性的值的宣告通常在以及所有衍生類別中載入的內容屬性指定。Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well. 套用空可讓衍生的類別的基底類別中移除的內容屬性的宣告 （並請注意，此類別有任何內容屬性）。Applying an empty enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and to note that the class has no content property). 套用不同的具名會取代繼承以新的。Applying a differently named replaces the inherited with the new one. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase 中，WPF 特定組件，而且也必須在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的平行實作。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase, and also had a parallel implementation in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 從.NET Framework 4.0， System.Xaml 組件中。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.0, is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 類別在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 使用的範例已，它類別繼承。An example of a class in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) that uses the is , which the class inherits from. 屬性是設定的內容屬性。The property is the content property set by the . 如果XAML，在具現化的會設定為開始和結束按鈕標籤之間的項目。If a is instantiated in XAML, the of the will be set to the element that is between the start and end button tags. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為類別`Film`具有套用。The following example creates a class named `Film` that has a applied. 具名屬性`Title`會表示為內容屬性。The property named `Title` is indicated as the content property. [!code-csharp[MarkupSnippets#MarkupContentPropertyAttribute](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#markupcontentpropertyattribute)] [!code-vb[MarkupSnippets#MarkupContentPropertyAttribute](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#markupcontentpropertyattribute)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於`Inherited=true`屬性的值的宣告通常在以及所有衍生類別中載入的內容屬性指定。Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well. 使用此簽章，或套用空，可讓衍生的類別的基底類別中移除的內容屬性的宣告 （並請注意，此類別有任何內容屬性）。Using this signature, or applying an empty , enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and note that the class has no content property).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: name
param.span: 表示內容屬性之屬性的屬性名稱。

span.span: The property name for the property that is the content property.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, by using the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假設 CLR 支援，提供`name`應符合相關的屬性，在 CLR 中的型別系統。Assuming CLR backing, the provided `name` should match the of the relevant property in the CLR type system.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
